common.description: A collection of tests! Enjoy various psychological tests and fun tests all in one place.

meta.title: TestMim | Free Psychological Tests, Personality Tests, MBTI, Fun Test Collection
meta.description: TestMim is a site that collects various free psychological tests, personality tests, MBTI, romance, animal, game and other fun tests in one place. Find the test that's right for you right now!
meta.keywords: TestMim, psychological test, free test, personality test, MBTI, romance test, animal test, game test, fun test, testmim, personality test, popular test

what_is_testmim.question: What is TestMim?
what_is_testmim.answer: TestMim is a platform that collects various free psychological tests, personality tests, MBTI, romance, animal, game and other fun tests in one place.

is_free.question: Are the tests free?
is_free.answer: Yes, all tests on TestMim are completely free to use.

what_types.question: What types of tests are available?
what_types.answer: There are fun tests in various categories including psychological tests, personality tests, MBTI, romance tests, animal tests, game tests, and destiny tests.

footer.copyright_notice: All content on this site is protected by copyright, and unauthorized copying and distribution are prohibited.
